snippet: Hundreds of thousands, waving flags and carrying signs, rallied in Barcelona on Tuesday for independence for the region of Catalonia.
abstract: Hundreds of thousands of people ralliy in Barcelona for independence for the region of Catalonia.
lead_paragraph: Hundreds of thousands, waving flags and carrying signs, rallied in Barcelona on Tuesday for independence for the region of Catalonia.

headline.main: Spain: Marchers Demand Independence for Catalonia, as Budget Cuts Bolster Separatism
headline.print_headline: Spain: Hundreds of Thousands Demand Independence For Catalonia, as Budget Cuts Bolster Separatism
